game.name: Test Cricket Manager
game.shortDescription: Take managerial control of the National cricket team (of your choice) and prepare to take them to Glory! YOU pick and train the players, YOU hire and fire the staff, YOU choose the tactics under pressure, YOU get the glory when things go right ... but YOU take the blame when things go wrong.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take managerial control of the National cricket team (of your choice) and prepare to take them to Glory! YOU pick and train the players, YOU hire and fire the staff, YOU choose the tactics under pressure, YOU get the glory when things go right ... but YOU take the blame when things go wrong.
